public class Command
extends java.lang.Object
a command that is inserted into the CLI during a match

    • Command

      public Command​(java.lang.String com, java.lang.String x, java.lang.String y, java.lang.String id, java.lang.String block)
      builds a command with its fields
      Parameters:
      com - command identifier
      x - x position
      y - y position
      id - worker id
      block - block id

  • Method Details

    • extract

      public boolean extract()
      converts the command fields from String to the right classes. int for position, Worker.IDs for worker, TurnAction for action identifier and BlockTypeEnum for the building block identifier.
      Returns:
      true if the command is extracted correctly;
